subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Rob Scuderi is not normally discussed as one of hockey’s top defensemen, but in Pittsburgh’s thrilling Game 6 victory, it was Scuderi who repeatedly saved the Penguins’ season.
snippet: Rob Scuderi is not normally discussed as one of hockey’s top defensemen, but in Pittsburgh’s thrilling Game 6 victory, it was Scuderi who repeatedly saved the Penguins’ season.
